name: DinoZone
description:
A simple virtual pet game made for Team Dogpit's Virtual Pet Jam. Feed and give water to a virtual Brontosaurus that grows over time in the DinoZone, a simulated environment designed to maximize the comfort of your dino.

CONTROLS

Move: WASD/arrow keys

Look: Mouse

Use item: Left mouse button

Change item: Scroll wheel/number keys 1-8

Click on your dino with the leaf or watering can to feed and provide water for it. Click on the ground with the laser pointer to encourage your dino to move to a certain place.
